protocol.name: P-G17193-1
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized with diluted bleach (10-min incubation in 1.7% sodium hypochlorite, rinsed and washed seven times in sterile water) and incubated in 2.5 mL of liquid growing media (Murashige and Skoog half-strength solution in six-well plates) containing 30 mM sucrose. The plates were incubated in the dark at 4째C for two days (vernalization, to promote homogeneous germination) and then transferred to 23째C for four days under continuous light before the treatments.

protocol.name: P-G17193-2
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings. Ecotype: Columbia 0; Age: 4 days; Germination: aerobic; Medium: Murashige-Skoog medium, half-strenght, sucrose 30 mM, 23째C, continuous light; Treated for 3h with chitosan under continuous light.

protocol.name: P-G17193-5
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the seedling samples using the Ambion RNAqueous kit (Ambion). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChip arrays.

protocol.name: P-G17193-6
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings. Ecotype: Columbia 0; Age: 4 days; Germination: aerobic; Medium: Murashige-Skoog medium, half-strenght, sucrose 30 mM, 23째C, continuous light; Treated for 3 hours with chitosan under continuous light.
